title: Fact-Checking Donald Trump’s Immigration Speech in Arizona – NBCNews.com
text: Home » International News » Fact-Checking Donald Trump’s Immigration Speech in Arizona – NBCNews.com Fact-Checking Donald Trump’s Immigration Speech in Arizona – NBCNews.com Fact-Checking Donald Trump’s Immigration Speech in Arizona NBCNews.com In a highly anticipated address on immigration Wednesday night in Arizona, Donald Trump lambasted the media for not reporting “the facts” he felt were relevant to the national conversation on immigration. “But the facts aren’t known because the media …
